section.title: __HAL_RTC_ALARM_DISABLE_IT

entry.para:
specifies the RTC Alarm interrupt sources to be enabled or disabled. This parameter can be any combination of the following values:
RTC_IT_ALRA: Alarm A interrupt
RTC_IT_ALRB: Alarm B interrupt
